mapper.select: SELECT TIPVIDEO_NO, MANAGER_NO, VIDEO_NAME, VIDEO_IMG, VIDEO_LINK, ADD_DATE FROM TIPVIDEOS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIPS(TIP_NO, TIP_IMG_URL, TIP_TITLE, TIP_CONTENT, TIP_WRITER, TO_CHAR(ADD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ADD_DATE) VALUES(C_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cImg}, #{cTitle}, #{cWriter}, #{cDt}, UTL_RAW.CAST_TO_RAW('#{cCon}'))
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TIPS WHERE 1 = 1
AND TIP_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND TIP_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TIPVIDEOS WHERE 1 = 1
AND TIP_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND TIP_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PSYTEST WHERE 1 = 1
AND CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT C.* FROM(SELECT TIP_NO, MANAGER_NO, TIP_IMG_URL, TIP_TITLE, SUBSTR(UTL_RAW.CAST_TO_VARCHAR2(TIP_CONTENT), 1, 80) AS TIP_CON, TIP_WRITER, TO_CHAR(ADD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ADD_DATE, DEL_CHECK, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TIP_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TIPS WHERE 1 = 1
AND TIP_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND TIP_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
) C

SELECT C.* FROM(SELECT TIPVIDEO_NO, MANAGER_NO, VIDEO_NAME, VIDEO_IMG, VIDEO_LINK, TO_CHAR(ADD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ADD_DATE2, DEL_CHECK, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TIPVIDEO_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TIPVIDEOS WHERE 1 = 1) C
SELECT C.* FROM(SELECT TEST_NO, MANAGER_NO, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ADD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ADD_DATE3, DEL_CHECK, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TEST_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM PSYTEST WHERE 1 = 1) C
